title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Workshop on Solving Social Issues Using Advanced Computer Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and understanding of secondary-level social issues
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design a social issue analysis process using Web 2.0 tools (Google Collaboration Tools, Padlet, etc.)
Learners can analyze community issue data using data visualization tools and present it as infographics
Learners can improve digital solution prototypes through peer assessment in a blended learning environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
